review_text: Not open when visiting on 13 August, 2023.
great place and must visit in cebu
A place you can visit if you want to know more about the history of Cebu and the churches it has.
Fantastic Philippines Cebu music history! Ahoo!
Historical facts over here, I hope people would appreciate the things here :)
The stuff of that Karenderya was good and hospitable and smiling

This is the only music museum in the Visayas. You can listen to old Philippine music here. You can gain more knowledge not just in folk songs but also the different musical instruments used by the ancestral people of the Philippines.
A place where you can meet traditional Filipino musical instruments. If you go …
I went for it on pur …
There are cebuano singer that you will not believe they are from Cebu and also the old instrument that ethnic group used are nice..
Thank you to Gullas family for thia. Very educational.
The history of Cebuano music and Rizal artifacts are here.

I am very grateful for the Gullas family in realizing this one-of-a-kind museum. It is dedicated on reliving the original filipino music through antique finds and musical instruments. Great place for a field trip for kids and the young at heart like me!
the regions only museum solely for music
